system_answer: Our baggage policy allows one personal item and one carry-on bag per passenger. The carry-on must fit in the overhead bin and be within 22 x 14 x 9 inches, weighing up to 40 pounds. Personal items should not exceed 18 x 14 x 8 inches. Checked baggage fees vary by fare type and route, with specific allowances for different classes. Additional fees apply for extra, overweight, or oversized bags. For detailed information, please let me know your fare type or route!

Checked baggage fees vary by fare type and route. Basic Economy fares do not include checked baggage, and the first checked bag costs $35 for domestic flights and $50 for international flights. Standard Economy includes one free checked bag (up to 50 pounds and 62 linear inches), with the second bag costing $45 domestic and $65 international. Sports equipment such as golf clubs, skis, snowboards, and bicycles can be checked for a fee of $75 per item, subject to size and weight restrictions. Musical instruments can be carried on if they fit in overhead bins or under seats, or checked for standard baggage fees. Large instruments may require purchasing an additional seat. Medical equipment, mobility devices, and assistive devices travel free of charge and do not count toward baggage allowances. Firearms must be declared and packed

system_answer: Saturn Airlines was founded by aviation entrepreneur Marcus Chen and a team of experienced pilots and industry professionals.

chunks_related.content: Saturn Airlines was founded in 1998 by aviation entrepreneur Marcus Chen and a team of experienced pilots and industry professionals. Headquartered in San Francisco, California, Saturn Airlines has grown from a regional carrier serving the West Coast to one of North America's premier airlines, operating over 500 daily flights to more than 80 destinations across the United States, Canada, Mexico, and the Caribbean. The company employs over 12,000 dedicated professionals and maintains a fleet of

SATURN AIRLINES - FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

COMPANY INFORMATION

dedicated account management, and flexible payment terms. Students with valid ID receive 10% off base fares year-round. Active military personnel and veterans receive priority boarding, free checked bags, and discounted fares. We also offer credit cards in partnership with major banks that earn bonus miles on everyday purchases and provide additional travel benefits.

user_question: How do I book a ticket?
system_answer: You can book a ticket through our official website at www.saturnairlines.com, our mobile app (available for iOS and Android), by calling our reservations center at 1-800-SATURN-1 (1-800-728-8761), or through authorized travel agents. Online bookings are available 24/7, and you can search for flights by destination, date, and number of passengers. If you need further assistance, please let me know!

Our booking system allows you to compare prices across different fare classes and select seats during the booking process.

You can upgrade your seat through multiple channels: during booking, after booking through "My Trips" on our website or app, at check-in, or at the airport. To upgrade online, log into your account, select your reservation, and click "Upgrade Seat." You'll see available upgrade options with pricing.
